You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick , 30, was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.

Eric Cantor said Republicans are trying to make good on a`` Pledge to America'' promise by cutting taxpayer funding for abortion. This is also consistent with reducing spending in Washington, Eric Cantor said during his weekly meeting with reporters. Should Republicans attach abortion language to must-pass legislation, Barbara Boxer Richard Blumenthal ( D-Conn.) said, Democrats must be ready to shine a light on political gamesmanship.

and the Philadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the James Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists.`` Michael Jordan jumper was deadly.''
